p: AJS designed the study, performed searches, extracted data, assessed data quality, performed statistical analyses and wrote the manuscript; BK performed searches, extracted data, assessed data quality and reviewed the manuscript; MYRH assisted with statistical analyses, performed the PAF analysis and reviewed the manuscript; EG and IK developed the models, performed statistical analyses and reviewed the manuscript; CdM provided input into the analysis and reviewed the manuscript; YH provided input into study design and analysis and reviewed the manuscript; AMG supervised the study design, analysis and interpretation, and reviewed and revised the manuscript.
